title: New strategy would allow for cheap, daily COVID-19 testing for big groups
author: Laura Counts
excerpt: UC Berkeley researchers have developed a strategy to massively increase the scale and frequency of COVID-19 testing while drastically lowering costs. The key is to pool samples using machine learning algorithms to look for transmission patterns and predict risk.
